name: FOE Petite Trio Headband
description:
A sweet little headband using soft FOE with gorgeous little flower appliques and rhinestone.
Suitable from 3 months up to adult.
Available colours: 
Ivory
Pink
Lemon & Pink

description:
Make a statement with these gorgeous satin and organza bows. Perfect to add to hair accessories or any crafting project you may be working on.

Satin & Mesh Rolled Rosette Flower Applique

name: Chevron Petite Bloom Pearl & Rhinestone  Chiffon Flower Applique
description:
These little chiffon chevron flowers are stunning, with two small colour coordinating pearl and rhinestones nestled in the centre and sit beautifully. Perfect for all your crafting projects. Felt base for easy gluing or may be hand stitched.
Approximate size: 2.75"

name: Christmas Rhinestone Shank Embellishment
description:
Perfect for giving your creations that Christmas touch.
Approximate size 21mm

name: Satin Spring Blossom Flower Applique
description:
These gorgeous flowers have been hand made using quality double faced french ribbon. They are finished with a small pearl in the centre and felt on the base for easy application to your projects. Ends have been heat sealed. Perfect for hair accessories, clips headbands and many other projects you may be working on.
Approximate size: 7 - 8 cm

name: Mini Chalkboards
description:
Our Mini Chalkboards are perfect for your market stall to pop your prices on and make your table stand out. You could also use these in your herb gardens or just about anything
Approximate size: 20cm High
Please note stands are raw not painted.

name: Shabby Chiffon Diamante Flower Appliques
description:
These gorgeous flowers are perfect for headbands, clips or brooches. They sit beautifully and are nice and full. A gorgeous sparkly star shaped diamante sits in the centre. Felt pad at base of flower for easy gluing.
Approximate Size: 2.5"

Bright Blue and Silver in stock but not pictured

name: Tulle Mesh Flower Applique Pearl & Rhinestone Centre
description:

name: Nagorie Curly Feather Pads
description:
Gorgeous feather pads, perfect for headbands fascinators or any of your crafting projects. Feathers are backed with a felt pad. To apply to your headbands or projects just simply glue them with either hot glue or your preferred choice of glue.

name: Parisian Rhinestone Flowers Seconds x 5
description:
You will receive 5 x Parisian Rhinestone Flowers. Colours will be mixed. Colours in each set will vary. 

Please note these flowers are seconds, some may have a stone missing or a loose stone, some may also have slight freying or slight marks from where the flower has been heat sealed and some may have all of the above.
Please ensure you understand this as no refunds will be given.

name: FOE Interchangable Pre Made Headbands
description:

name: Bird Applique Forgotten Dreams, Rosa Lemon
description:
These appliques are all pre cut and ready for you to sew on to your tops or singlets. Applique have heat and bond applied to the back. Fabric is Forgotten Dreams, Rosa Lemon
Approx Size 
Vertical bird 11cm x 3.4cm
Horizontal bird 8cm x 9cm

You will receive 2 appliques along with instructions on how to apply.

name: Bird Applique Antique Rose Collection by Lecien
description:

Horizontal bird 8cm x 9cm

You will receive 2 appliques along with instructions on how to apply.

name: Sweet Birdies Applique April Cornell for Moda Fabric
description:
These gorgeous little appliques make it so easy to turn a simple top or singlet into a gorgeous piece! So simple to use! We have taken out all the hard work for you. Appliques are all pre cut with Heat & Bond applied all you need to do is iron on and sew. Fabric is April Cornell for Moda.

Approx Size 
Vertical bird 11cm x 3.4cm
Horizontal bird 8cm x 9cm

You will receive 2 appliques along with instructions on how to apply.
